definition: (of the sun) to set
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan

sentences.english: Meanwhile the Fox will come down from the mountains and will metamorphose itself into a Wolf.
sentences.chinese: 期間，狐狸會下山，會把自己變成狼。

sentences.english: How time fast! The sun set. It is time to come back.
sentences.chinese: 時間過得真快呀，太陽下山了，我們也該回去了。

sentences.english: I thought I saw Susanna, Coming down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 在夢中見蘇珊娜，漫步下山來相迎。

sentences.english: Sad about the move, I bicycled down the hill to Helen's.
sentences.chinese: 因爲要搬走，我很傷心，騎車下山來到海倫家。

sentences.english: Temperatures over 44 degrees C (110 degrees F) made clambering down the steep slopes arduous.
sentences.chinese: 由於氣溫超過44℃，因此由陡坡攀爬下山非常費力。

sentences.english: The stone rolled down the mountain by gravity.
sentences.chinese: 這塊石頭由於重力作用而滾下山。

sentences.english: A burning orange sun sets behind a fringe of pampas grass in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 日本，強烈的橙色太陽在蒲葦邊緣的後面下山了。

sentences.english: Why, I always go down at full gallop.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我總是打着馬飛跑下山的。

sentences.english: Millions of money to anger, revenge Japanese mountain.
sentences.chinese: 錢百萬怒不可遏，決意下山報復日軍。

sentences.english: I arrived at Greta‘s house today just after sunset.
sentences.chinese: 這天，太陽剛下山我就來到葛麗塔家了。

sentences.english: Chen then put down the gun three Tian tree.
sentences.chinese: 陳三炮隨後放田樹才下山。

sentences.english: Right down the mountain and onto the ship.
I took him on my shoulder and then carried him down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 後來發現我扛不動他，就去借了一匹馬，駝着他下山。

sentences.english: She bent at the knee when she skied downhill.
sentences.chinese: 她滑雪下山時曲膝下蹲。

sentences.english: The horse dashed down the hill.
When the sun goes down, the rocks stay warm. But the dust of the moon cannot store heat.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽下山時，岩石依舊溫暖，但月球上的塵埃存熱。

definition: to go uphill/to spin cocoon (silkworms)/to pass away
Yamashita (Japanese surname)
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
foot of a mountain
hilltop
mountain road
to climb a mountain/climbing/mountaineering
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
to return/to go back/to come back
to be on foot
to climb a mountain/to mountaineer/hiking/mountaineering
to take the back roads/to take the side streets/to take the small paths
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
Mt Emei in Sichuan, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Samantabhadra 普賢|普贤
to hasten on with one's journey/to hurry on
to get dark/dusk
